package.name: YOOCHOOSE_Recommender_Engine
package.summary: Use our superior and patented recommender engine to boost your online sales with personalized and self-learning recommendations.
package.description:
All leading online shops have already identifies the enormous revenue potential of professional recommendation services. Our experiences with other online shops show that a sales growth of up to 20% can be expected.
Recommendation types supported by the extension: People who bought this product, also bought that. People who searched for this kind of product, finally bought this. Best sellers. Personalized recommendations: Products recommended according to the user's click or buy.
package.notes:
New features: - Dynamic home page with best sellers and personalized recommendations for the current customer. - Multiple rows in the recommendation blocks. - Conversion rate and added revenue in the Yoochoose configuration backend.
Updates and Bug-Fixes: - Completely rewritten manual. - Simplified configuration. - No SQL changes needed for installation - Manual entered recommendations fixed - Customer profile transfer simplified
